Great fit , very flattering! Happy with fabric and quality.

I was excited for a nice oversized sweater I could wear with leggings. Sadly, this was NOT it. The sweater is plenty wide enough, but it is not long enough and the sleeves are short. Great sweater, got it in 2 colors, size medium (as it is roomy) washes and dry great!  Love the long, tight cuffs.  An easy, layering piece.  And the price was wonderful!

I absolutely love this sweater. I’m 5’3 about 150lb and ordered a size M. This sweater pairs well with leggings and booties. The material is soft and is not form fitting, but not oversized. Definitely recommend.
This sweater is absolutely gorgeous. It is so soft and I am very impressed with it.

Love the oversized look with boots and leggings
very nice light sweater. fits perfect. no negatives.

I love this sweater.  It fits great. It’s so soft and the color is beautiful!

This sweater is a really nice color and weight.  However, the sleeve seams were sewn inside out!  I thought, perhaps, the tag was just sewn on the outside vs. inside, and maybe if I turned it inside out it would be right. But there were other seams (around neck, etc.) that were sewn correctly.  So ultimately, this sweater had a mix of seams sewn correctly and others that were inside out.  I wish I would have paid attention to other reviews stating this same issue, but I was hoping it wouldn't be a problem.  I returned for full refund.
Nice sweater fit nicely.
Nice loose top, not too heavy, warm, soft, great value!
Runs small according to size chart. Also not long sleeved. More like 3/4 length. Nice quality!

I originally purchased a large but felt it was too big but if you like an oversized look then it’s perfect.  I returned it and repurchased the medium which for me felt better.  This sweater is well made and very pretty I ended up ordering another one in a different color and ordered one for a gift.  I highly recommend!
Very comfortable and it’s a cheaper version of the one I saw at H&M. Love this!

The blue color is beautiful fits true to size - comfortable - would purchase again
This sweater is soft, so flattering, great quality and beautiful. I would buy it in every color!

This was the first sweater I purchased off Amazon and was very surprised by the quality. It's a soft and fairly think material. I wash it on delicate and hang to dry. I've worn and washed it a few times and it still looks new with no pilling. I'm 5'7" and 150 lbs and got a medium.

Just got this and I love it! I am 5’3, 190. I got a XL for a little oversized look.  This is much softer and cozier than I thought it would be! Love the slight mock turtleneck, the fitted cuffs, and the overall cut and drape. I will definitely order more colors!

评论概述: Great color, no "slouch," and too many wrinkles
评论详情: I liked the beautiful blue color and the fit was okay, though it doesn't have the same slouchy look on the model. I ordered a small, as usual, having narrow shoulders; maybe a medium would have been better. As other reviews mentioned, it was packed in an air-tight bag that required washing in order to remove the wrinkles.  Not crazy over washing something brand new. Even after lying flat, the wrinkles are still there, though faint.  A steam iron may do the trick. A plus is the softness of the fabric.

This would have been a super cute fall sweater. However this is made inside out, which wouldn’t be a big deal except the neck part is also backwards so when worn so the seams of the rest of the seater are correct, the neck isn’t. Oh well. That’s what I get for thinking I was getting a deal when they offered 50% off on it.

This was good quality and so nice but not the style for me so I sent it back the neck was a little small for my liking
